body:
<!-- Thanks for filing an issue! Before hitting the button, please answer these questions.-->

**Is this a request for help?** (If yes, you should use our troubleshooting guide and community support channels, see http://kubernetes.io/docs/troubleshooting/.):
No

**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.):

rbac elasticsearch elasticsearch-logging fluentd-elasticsearch 

---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one):
Bug report
<!--
If this is a BUG REPORT, please:
  - Fill in as much of the template below as you can.  If you leave out
    information, we can't help you as well.

If this is a FEATURE REQUEST, please:
  - Describe *in detail* the feature/behavior/change you'd like to see.

In both cases, be ready for followup questions, and please respond in a timely
manner.  If we can't reproduce a bug or think a feature already exists, we
might close your issue.  If we're wrong, PLEASE feel free to reopen it and
explain why.
-->

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"7+", GitVersion:"v1.7.0-alpha.3.395+885ddcc1389bf7", GitCommit:"885ddcc1389bf744f00e7a5f96fbff5515423022", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-05-15T06:32:31Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.3", GitCommit:"0480917b552be33e2dba47386e51decb1a211df6", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-05-10T15:38:08Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

**Environment**:
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: bare metal on premises
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Ubuntu 16.04.2
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`): Linux overmind 4.4.0-77-generic #98-Ubuntu SMP Wed Apr 26 08:34:02 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
- **Install tools**: kubeadm 
- **Others**:

**What happened**:
fluentd and and elasticsearch pods did not start 

**What you expected to happen**:
fluentd and elasticsearch to start 

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
Enable "fluentd-elasticsearch" cluster addon on a Cluster with RBAC enabled

**Anything else we need to know**:

I'm uncertain if these cluster addons are still supported, at least https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/cluster-administration/addons/ lists them under deprecated and #44454 mentions that currently there will be no improvements to this addon specifically. Still it is completely broken with RBAC enabled.

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Auth.
labels.name: sig/auth

title: cluster addon fluentd-elasticsearch does not work with RBAC enabled
